snippet: Mr. Skelos, the former Republican majority leader of the State Senate, and Mr. Silver, a Democrat who was the State Assembly speaker, are scheduled to appear in court on April 13.
abstract: Former New York State Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver and former State Senate Dean G Skelos, both convicted of corruption charges, will be sentenced at separate sessions on April 13.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Skelos, the former Republican majority leader of the State Senate, and Mr. Silver, a Democrat who was the State Assembly speaker, are scheduled to appear in court on April 13.

headline.main: Sentencings for Dean Skelos and Sheldon Silver Are Now Set for Same Day
headline.print_headline: Skelos and Silver Are Now Set  to Be Sentenced on Same Day
